metadata.title: CVE-2024-38632 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:vfio/pci: fix potential memory leak in vfio_intx_enable()If vfio_irq_ctx_alloc() failed will lead to 'name' memory leak.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
